it.polimi.se2018.controller.effects.checkMethods.checkConstraintMethods

Interface CheckConstraint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckDieNoColorConstraints, CheckDieNotAdjacency, CheckDieNoValueConstraints, CheckDiePlacement, CheckNotAdjacent

    public interface CheckConstraint
    ConstraintChecker Interface This interface is used to call all constraint checker
    Author:
    Luca Massini, Davide Lorenzi (JDocs)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkConstraint(int newRow, int newColumn, Die chosenDie, Player player) 

    • Method Detail

      • checkConstraint

        boolean checkConstraint(int newRow,
                        int newColumn,
                        Die chosenDie,
                        Player player)
        Parameters:
        newRow - row in which the player wanna set the die after the application of the ToolCard
        newColumn - column in which the player wanna set the die after the application of the ToolCard
        chosenDie - is the die chosen on which wil be applied the effects of the chosen ToolCard
        player - is the player that bought the ToolCard
        Returns:
        true if the constraint are respected, false otherwise
